title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Whisk eggs and parmesan in a bowl.
Mix everything together with pasta and season with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, then grill.
Cook onions and tomatoes into a thick sauce.
Add spices and cream, simmer until smooth.
Mix grilled chicken into the sauce and serve hot.
